articles.description: New research has unveiled that a new botnet malware MyloBot is rapidly spreading and has already compromised thousands of systems.
articles.content:
A sophisticated botnet known as MyloBot has compromised thousands of systems, with most of them located in India, the U.S., Indonesia, and Iran.
That's according to new findings from BitSight, which… [+2226 chars]
